#summary It's the basic starting weapon. Quote: "it's not very effective".

= Description =

This is the starting weapon, it breaks after 4 uses


==Details==

  * Drops from [Zombie]
  * Does 25 DMG
  * Can kill 1 enemy if at full condition
  * Is the weakest weapon

  * [Taser]
